column3: Hi, how can I help you?
Hi! I am looking for a rental apartment in Williamsburg.
Williamsburg is a nice area. What other preferences do you have, such as bedroom, price etc.?
Could you check if there is any 2 bedrooms under $3000?
54 apartments found. Do you have a preference on year-built or price?
Got it! There are 7 apartments built after 2000. {{copy searched results}}
These options look good. Send me the list of those apartments please.
Done! Is there anything else that I can help you with?
No that's it. Thank you. Bye!
